name: React Portfolio
description: This application was created for showing an online portfolio website using react.js, bootstrap and react-router.

name: README Generator
description: This application generates a README file based on criteria that user selected in CLI.

name: Daily Planner
description: This app will run in the browser, and will feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript and jQuery. It will have a responsive user interface that adapts to multiple screen sizes. Daily Planner is an online schedule for adding important events in selected time slots.

name: Flashlight Effect
description: Flash light effect on mouse cursor using css and javascript.

name: Password Generator
description: This application generates a random password based on criteria that user selected. This app will run in the browser, and will feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript code. It will have a responsive user interface that adapts to multiple screen sizes.

name: Only HTML & CSS Portfolio
description: This project was created for showing an online portfolio website. It contains HTML and CSS. For earliest stage it consentrates on simplest way of creating a responsive single page application using HTML and grid or flex box with CSS.
